data.title: Right Between the Eyes (Wax song)
data.text:
1986 single by Wax

"Right Between the Eyes" is a song by English duo Wax. It appears on their 1986 debut album Magnetic Heaven, and was released as the duo's second single from the album.

Reception

[edit]

The song became a No. 1 hit in Spain and a moderate hit in Ireland, Belgium and the Netherlands. In the U.S., it reached No. 43 while in the UK, the song managed a peak charting of No. 60, and remained on the chart for 5 weeks.[2]

Track listing

[edit]

7"/12" single

A. "Right Between the Eyes" - 4:05/6:57

B. "Only a Visitor" - 4:57

Charts

[edit]

Chart (1987) Peak

position Belgium (Ultratop 50 Flanders)[3] 18 Ireland (IRMA)[4] 28 Netherlands[5] 24 Spain (AFYVE)[6] 1 UK Singles (OCC)[7] 60 US Billboard Hot 100[8] 43

Personnel

[edit]

Andrew Gold – lead vocals, electric guitar, synthesizer, drums

Graham Gouldman – bass, backing vocals
